attributes.additional_details:
Fluoride should not added to drinking water.

The disadvantages of fluoride are:
Kidney problems
Thyroid problems
Bone cancer in young boys
Low birth rates
Low sperm count
Low testostrerone levels
Increase risk of Alzheimer's disease
And many more.

For further info: http://wideshut.co.uk/should-i-drink-this/


The government needs to research this matter and ban fluoride from drinking water.
